participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and easy-going, enjoys outdoor activities and values simple pleasures.
participant_1.background: i'm a huge coffee lover. my father was a construction worker. i hate the color pink. i do not drink alcohol. i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, finds joy in crafting and baking, but carries a sense of vulnerability.
participant_2.background: i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i'm scared of dying. i've a dogs.

content.text: What do you think about knitting?
Do you like cookies? I have some)
